solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean repeatedSubstringPattern(String str) {--newline--        int l = str.length();--newline--        for(int i=l/2;i>=1;i--) {--newline--            if(l%i==0) {--newline--                int m = l/i;--newline--                String subS = str.substring(0,i);--newline--                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();--newline--                for(int j=0;j<m;j++) {--newline--                    sb.append(subS);--newline--                }--newline--                if(sb.toString().equals(str)) return true;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return false;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
